languages.text: {n}Маршал Стракс смотрит все так же прямо. Ни один мускул не дергается на его волевом лице. Даже поверженный и загнанный в угол, он кажется несокрушимой громадой по сравнению с остальными.{/n}
{n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as firm as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even in cornered defeat, compared to the others, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маршал Стракс смотрит все так же прямо. Ни один мускул не дергается на его волевом лице. Даже поверженный и загнанный в угол, он кажется несокрушимой громадой по сравнению с остальными.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as direct as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even defeated and cornered, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock compared to the rest.{/n}
{n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as direct as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even defeated and cornered, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock compared to the rest.{/n}

{n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as firm as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even in cornered defeat, compared to the others, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marschall Strachs' Miene ist streng wie immer. In seinem versteinerten Gesicht regt sich kein Muskel. Selbst in der Niederlage scheint er im Gegensatz zu den anderen ein unzerstörbarer Fels zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as firm as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even in cornered defeat, compared to the others, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marschall Strachs' Miene ist streng wie immer. In seinem versteinerten Gesicht regt sich kein Muskel. Selbst in der Niederlage scheint er im Gegensatz zu den anderen ein unzerstörbarer Fels zu sein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le regard du maréchal Strachs n'a rien perdu de sa fermeté. Pas un frémissement ne vient troubler sa façade de marbre. Comparé aux autres, il ressemble à un pilier de pierre inébranlable, même dans la défaite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as firm as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even in cornered defeat, compared to the others, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard du maréchal Strachs n'a rien perdu de sa fermeté. Pas un frémissement ne vient troubler sa façade de marbre. Comparé aux autres, il ressemble à un pilier de pierre inébranlable, même dans la défaite.{/n}

languages.text: {n}斯塔克斯元帅的目光一如既往地坚定。他保持着冷峻的身姿，肌肉没有一丝颤动。即便已经一败涂地，与其他人相比，他也仿佛坚不可摧的石柱一般。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as firm as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even in cornered defeat, compared to the others, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}斯塔克斯元帅的目光一如既往地坚定。他保持着冷峻的身姿，肌肉没有一丝颤动。即便已经一败涂地，与其他人相比，他也仿佛坚不可摧的石柱一般。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mirada del Mariscal Strachs es tan firme como siempre. No le tiembla ni un músculo. Incluso derrotado y acorralado, parece una columna de piedra más que una persona.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as firm as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even in cornered defeat, compared to the others, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada del Mariscal Strachs es tan firme como siempre. No le tiembla ni un músculo. Incluso derrotado y acorralado, parece una columna de piedra más que una persona.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ストラッチス将帥の視線は相変わらず固い。彼の堅苦しい外見は、筋肉一つ動かない。敗北に追い詰められても、他の者たちに比べると、彼は不滅の岩石柱のように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as firm as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even in cornered defeat, compared to the others, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ストラッチス将帥の視線は相変わらず固い。彼の堅苦しい外見は、筋肉一つ動かない。敗北に追い詰められても、他の者たちに比べると、彼は不滅の岩石柱のように見える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Miralay Strachs'ın her zamanki keskin ve kararlı tavrı, bakışlarından okunuyor. Kayadan sert suratında tek bir kas bile oynamıyor. Köşeye sıkışıp hezimete uğradığı bu çaresiz anda bile diğerlerine kıyasla yıkılmaz bir taş sütun gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marshal Strachs's gaze is as firm as ever. Not one muscle quivers in his hard exterior. Even in cornered defeat, compared to the others, he appears as an indestructible pillar of rock.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Miralay Strachs'ın her zamanki keskin ve kararlı tavrı bakışlarından okunuyor. Kayadan sert suratında tek bir kas bile oynamıyor. Köşeye sıkışıp hezimete uğradığı bu çaresiz anda bile duruşuyla, diğerlerine kıyasla yıkılmaz bir taş sütununu andırıyor.{/n}
